SKT_FIRST.name: Firing L.E.N.S.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000009_1_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000009_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Healing.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Heals the selected ally's Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 【治療を開始します。】の\nスキルターン-2ターン

description: Heals the selected ally's Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000009_2_1]</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方単体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復させる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Generating Boundary.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Heals all allies's Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> that absorbs <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> damage for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Heals all allies's Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000009_3_1]</color> and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> that absorbs <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000009_3_2]</color> damage for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000009_3_2] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 회복시키고, <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>의 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復させ、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant barriers to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the target's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000009_chain_1_1]</color> chance to grant barriers to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000009_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the target's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000009_backup_1_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000009_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 실드를 부여합니다. 실드량은 대상의 체력에 비례합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率でシールドを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。対象のHPが高いほど、シールド量がUPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
